section.title: Third Party Tools that work with iPlay4e

item.title: Masterplan adventure design studio
item.content: Masterplan is an adventure planning / campaign design tool for Dungeons & Dragons (4th edition). Build campaigns and adventures with no fuss - it handles the calculations so you can concentrate on the plot.

item.title: inCombat encounter tracker
item.content: Run your encounters as efficiently as possible with this Adobe AIR combat tracker. You'll have quick and easy access to everything from hit points and initiative to conditions and character details. Of course, don't forget the ability to view iPlay4e character sheets directly in-application.

item.title: Epic Words online campaign manager
item.content: Create a home for your Role Playing Games to live and grow on Epic Words. They have put together a suite of on-line campaign management tools, organized for both groups and individuals. Blog in character, post information as the game master, create wikis to share with players and more! Keep track of your adventures and record your glory!
